483 Greenwich St., NYC, 1944, and Linde Air Products Co., Hillside, NJ, 1944; War Shipping Administration, 44th St., 1944, and Fordham University, Broadway, NYC, 1944; Naval Powder Factory, Indian Head, MD, 1944; Biltmore Towers, White Plains, NY 1966; Lord and Taylor, Manhasset, NY, 1967; Travelers Data Center, Hartford, CT, 1968; Mother Cabrini Hospital, Edgecomb Ave., NYC, 1967; Bayview Rehabilitation Center, Eleventh Ave., NYC, 1967; Arlington Junior High School, La Grange, NY, 1966; Vanderbilt Replacement, St. Luke's Hospital, NYC, 1966; Administration Building, S.U.N.Y Stony Brook, NY, 1969; Suffolk State School, Building #80, 1967; 330 Madison Ave., NYC, 1966; Associated Dry Goods, Fifth Ave., 1966
